name: Jerry's endless travels:Destroy cursed ball (ZX Spectrum)
name_original: Jerry's endless travels:Destroy cursed ball (ZX Spectrum)
description:
This is third game in series "Jerry's endless travels" after "Jerry's endless travels:Save Erick" and "Jerry's endless travels:Escape". Since strange things happens all the time Jerry have no choice and returns to this planet back to destroy a cursed ball which creates illusions. But first Jerry must use different items to solve puzzle and save his friend, who knows more about cursed ball. This game currently unfinished. 

Controls:

Jerry: o-left, p-right, space - jump, b -take item,

1,2,3 - use item.

Ghost:0-left,p-right,q-up,a-down.

Here is some things Jerry experienced in 1st game because of the cursed ball:

1.When game lost or won nothing happens. Jerry have to use letters on the sky(another illusion) to find way.

2.Pit without escape. Surely sign of curse.

3.He doesn't even remember which one of them is his friend. Smart Erick used a password to confirm who is he and that way Jerry saves him.

4. No word "lives" near number of lives. Jerry doesn't feel pain and survived only based on his knowledge about cursed planets.

5. No steps sound. His ears were cursed too.

6. Not all creatures you seen were are real ones, some of them are just illusion.
